
{{alias}}( x, value )
    Fills an input ndarray with a specified value.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ndarrayLike
        Input ndarray-like object.

    value: any
        Scalar value.

    Examples
    --------
    // Define ndarray data and meta data...
    > var xbuf = new {{alias:@stdlib/array/float64}}( [ 1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0 ] );
    > var dtype = 'float64';
    > var shape = [ 2, 2 ];
    > var sx = [ 2, 1 ];
    > var ox = 0;
    > var order = 'row-major';

    > x = {
    ...     'dtype': dtype,
    ...     'data': xbuf,
    ...     'shape': shape,
    ...     'strides': sx,
    ...     'offset': ox,
    ...     'order': order
    ... };

    > {{alias}}( x, 10.0 );
    > x.data
    <Float64Array>[ 10.0, 10.0, 10.0, 10.0 ]

    See Also
    --------
